meanings.definition: To divide (data) into packets for transmission.
meanings.sent1: I am packetizing the information before sending it over the internet.
meanings.sent2: The computer is packetizing the large file into smaller parts for easier transfer.
meanings.sent3: Packetizing the data is like putting puzzle pieces into separate boxes.
meanings.sent4: She was packetizing her thoughts, breaking them down into manageable chunks.
meanings.sent5: The process of packetizing ensures that the data reaches its destination intact.

meanings.definition: To organize or arrange (something) into packets.
meanings.sent1: The teacher is packetizing the worksheets for each student.
meanings.sent2: Packetizing the documents will make it easier to distribute them to the team.
meanings.sent3: I am packetizing my snacks for the road trip to keep them organized.
meanings.sent4: She was packetizing her schedule, allocating time slots for each task.
meanings.sent5: Packetizing the supplies into separate bags helped streamline the packing process.
